DOC.brief_summary: The goal research optimize online mobile multicomponent 12-month diet lifestyle intervention improve blood glucose control individual type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Web-Delivered Interventions Blood Sugar Control Individuals With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The research identify promise intervention component . The following component test : dietary adherence test breath meter , text message , diet-appropriate food cookbook . The primary goal optimize intervention examine HbA1c result 12 month .
DOC.criteria: overweight obese Englishspeaking diagnosis type 2 diabetes ( HbA1c > 6.5 % ) regular access internet text message take diabetes medication metformin pregnant breastfeeding currently undergo cancer treatment untreated serious mental illness
